name: Lucid Lands
description:
A man finds himself wondering a world searching for the meaning of existence. faced with the development of his own persona he searches on. A Man judges you of your sins, your actions seal your fate.

Lucid lands

 

Controls:

  • W- forward, A- left, S- back, D- right
  • Use mouse to look around
  • Left click in interaction

 

Pre-made assets:

Music- Marconi Union – Weightless

Movement controls- First person all in one (unity asset store)

Old man asset: landlord (Turbo squid 3DAssetForge )

Asian man (turbo squid bizkit001)

UwU
